title: @KateyKhaos DJ Sona's Concussive VO is not working properly
body:
Title.
Her in-game voice over is bugged when using Concussive (red) form. I can hear Sona starting to say a word but it gets instantly cut. Kinetic and Ethereal worked fine for me. Could you look into it?

replies.body: Hey folks! Thanks so much for calling this out. I'll get this fixed up right away!
Hi hi! Lemme see if I can have one of our sound designers help me out on this one. :)
It's super annoying, and ruining my fun when i use her. It feels like this happened after 8.5 but i'm not sure.
Yeah in 8.4 her music was bugged along with the announcer and both were getting muted by other in-game sounds. 8.5 fixed it but her Concussive form is now broken and she doesn't talk anymore.
